column2: and Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba offers a really nice experience.  The food is very good
column3: but the best tapas I've ever had (Emilio's) but it's very good.  They have a new single bite menu that's really awesome
column4: it offers super rich tastes of really delicious food (like the Spanish brownie which might be one of my top 10 favorite things I've ever tasted).
